articles.author: Stephen Gandel
articles.title: Wells Fargo fires workers for 'simulating' being at their keyboards - Financial Times
articles.description: Accusation that bank staff tried to fool managers is the latest sign of a crackdown on hybrid work
articles.content: Wells Fargo has fired several employees for allegedly trying to fool their bosses into thinking they were working when they were not, in the latest example of a crackdown on non-compliant staff in th… [+2479 chars]
